page.title: 14C.ofE.Primary Exbourne
page.content: Block ref 02600099 placed here for convenience,repeated next block. A village voluntary school or Dame school was here in 1839.Exbourne National school was established in 1876 when the present school was built of stone.We have 30 pupils in our school. We have two classrooms. There are 13 pupils in the junior class and 17 pupils in the infants. Our dinner comes from Okehampton Comprehensive school. We usually have chips.We have 1 computer,1television,1 radio and 1 tape recorder between us.In our school we have three teachers,Mrs.Friend-the Infants-Mrs Goffey teaches top infants and lower Juniors(she takes them down to the village hall) Mr.Morris, Headmaster, takes the top Juniors.We have a field for games,across the main road.The 4th.yrs.go to Okehampton College in September.
